alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 05 at 10:05AM CST until February 08 at 8:24AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...Until Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Sunday the stage was 4.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CST Sunday was 4.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Neches River Neches River Saltwater Barri 4.0 4.2 Sun 9 am CST 4.0 3.7 3.5 &&
